snippet: Manu Ginobili returned to give the short-handed San Antonio Spurs a needed boost as they remained perfect at home and extended the franchise's best start....
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginobili returned to give the short-handed San Antonio Spurs a needed boost as they remained perfect at home and extended the franchise's best start.

headline.main: Spurs, Missing 3 Starters, Improve to 30-0 at Home
headline.print_headline: Spurs, Missing 3 Starters, Improve to 30-0 at Home
